meanings.definition: The state or condition of being paramount.
meanings.sent1: In our group project, the paramountcies of teamwork and cooperation were evident.
meanings.sent2: The paramountcies of honesty and integrity should never be underestimated.
meanings.sent3: The paramountcies of sharing snacks at recess were taken very seriously by the students.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership skills were the paramountcies that guided the team to success.
meanings.sent5: The paramountcies of kindness and compassion can truly make a difference in someone's day.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being of the greatest importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: The paramountcies of family and love were cherished above all else.
meanings.sent2: During the emergency, the paramountcies of safety and quick action were crucial.
meanings.sent3: The paramountcies of choosing the right outfit for the party caused quite a dilemma.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was the paramountcies that set him apart from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The paramountcies of education and learning pave the way for a brighter future.
